name: Football World League 2021
description:
Football world league is soccer game with the atmosphere of real soccer.

In game, your knowledge of real-world football is an invaluable asset, as players' individual skill levels, play styles and moves are rendered in-game with meticulous attention to detail.

Choose your team, with 80 best football club in the world. Build the best squad (nearly 1000 star players), become a manager and lead them all the way to win league or champion cup.
Pass and dribble around opponents, take aim, kick, head, shoot, score … GOAL!

Game features:
- Realistic football manager in 3D.
- Free and easy to play soccer game.
- Play with your favorite soccer team.
- Transfer player, build dream team, win a cup.
- Stunning 3D graphics.

This app is an offline soccer game. Enjoy the beautiful game anytime and anywhere!
